title: Python and JavaScript developer
snippet:
Looking for an experienced developer  for a long-term project. 
 You will work with a team of international experts for this project.
 Language: Python, JavaScript
 Must be experienced  with web scraping with real browsers (desktop and mobile), services like saucelabs, browserstack, basic knowledge of working with popup and display ads.
 Project: Creating a scraper to scrap ads  from multiple websites and storing them in the database. 
The project will be in Python but the basic JS knowledge is required for scraping these websites with ad tags.
You'll be responsible for developing and maintaining this project.
We'll provide you with all resources and strategies which are required to find these websites with specific ad tags.
